ygData.msgSnippet: Listen, I don t know shit in computers other than what I do at work, and I m working in a bank, not a hi-tech company. Besides, I don t want to know anything

Listen, I don't know shit in computers other than what I do at work, 
and I'm working in a bank, not a hi-tech company. Besides, I don't 
want to know anything about programming. But the point is that Rauq is 
not telling people not to post, but not to overpost. Battles are very 
confusing already and the fact that some people post more attacks than 
they get adds to the heaviness of the rpg. That is the reason.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Yeh rAuq telling people not to post is stupid. 
> This rpg needed a jump start and now we're back to
> full strenght and he's telling us NOT to post, is it
> our fault he's to busy to keep the events page
> properly updated, but yet has failed to convey the
> knowledge to Winged Warrior?
> 
> --- aerosmith60@c... wrote:
> >  OOC: All right people lets try and stop arguing
> > amongst ourselves. When I 
> > played this rpg there was never a council
> > member(well it was yan then) who 
> > said dont post while im gone. So I apologize for
> > continuing,  posting back in 
> > the day we just kept going and the person had to
> > catch up. I think the 
> > council needs a little meeting to deal with all
> > these problems. I really 
> > didn't give my characters a proper introduction
> > either and for that im sorry 
> > I just felt it was a good way to further a story
> > line. Such as Proto joining 
> > Megatron's ranks and The Rodimus Prime vs. Galvatron
> > feud which I am really 
> > looking forward to.
> > 
>
